name: Learn Quizer
description: An interactive quiz application built with React and TypeScript, designed to help users learn and test their knowledge across various subjects.
shortDescription: An interactive quiz application built with React and TypeScript.

name: MoveIt Work Flow
description: A comprehensive work flow application built with React and TypeScript, featuring task management, scheduling, and progress tracking functionalities.
shortDescription: A work flow application with task management and scheduling features.

name: Pour Perfect
description: A mobile-first practice application that enables aspiring bartenders to develop and refine free pouring skills using device motion sensors. The application simulates real-world pouring scenarios with immediate feedback, helping users master the precision counting techniques required in professional bartending environments.
shortDescription: A mobile-first app to practice bartending free pouring skills using device motion sensors.

name: Tic Tac Toe App
description: A simple tic-tac-toe game built with React and TypeScript to practice frontend development skills.
shortDescription: A simple tic-tac-toe game built with React and TypeScript.
